message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper proposes a novel approach for learning exploration strategies in reinforcement learning, which falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), systems and control (cs.SY), and multi-agent systems (cs.MA). The paper focuses on developing a surrogate objective for learning highly exploring and fast mixing policies, which is a core problem in reinforcement learning and falls under the scope of these sub-categories. Additionally, the empirical evaluation of the proposed algorithm is conducted on a set of hard-exploration tasks, which further supports the relevance of these sub-categories.
